downloadTitle: Developing Third-Party Applications with Exchange APIs
downloadDescription: Presentation from the Microsoft Exchange Community (MEC) Technical Airlift - September 13-14, 2022

downloadFile.name: Developing Third-Party Applications with Exchange APIs.pdf

detailsSection:
This session is a deep dive into the challenges associated with developing third-party applications that access Exchange data in Office 365, Hybrid and on-premises Exchange organizations. Topics to be covered include authentication, discovery, and using Exchange Web Services and the Microsoft Graph to access and search Mailbox data. It also covers how you can enhance email applications by adding interoperability with Microsoft Teams.

Recording of presentation by Glen Scales is at https://youtu.be/a8ECVg_0hQI.
detailsSection_file_name: Developing Third-Party Applications with Exchange APIs.pdf
